commit.message: Use object instead of LLVM for reading bitcode from rlibs

files.patch:
@@ -13,6 +13,7 @@ cstr = "0.2"
 libc = "0.2"
 libloading = "0.7.1"
 measureme = "10.0.0"
+object = { version = "0.29.0", default-features = false, features = ["std", "read_core", "archive", "coff", "elf", "macho", "pe"] }
 tracing = "0.1"
 rustc_middle = { path = "../rustc_middle" }
 rustc-demangle = "0.1.21"
